question: What are the current technology trends and focus areas in the healthcare industry, and how are companies in this sector adapting to these trends?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the healthcare industry to analyze their technology focus areas.
Gather data on technology adoption trends relevant to the healthcare industry, including specific emerging technologies and strategic focus areas.
Analyze the IT focus areas of identified healthcare companies to understand their strategic initiatives and investments in new technologies.
Examine any relevant social media presence and interactions of healthcare companies to assess their engagement with technology adoption narratives and customer outreach.
